unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Gets a Desi Twist!**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Gets a Desi Twist!**

unnormalised: Hey creators! Level up your Insta game, because follower analytics are getting a whole lot smarter. Forget just likes; we're talking deep dives into who's *really* vibing with your content.
normalised: Hey creators! Level up your Insta game, because follower analytics are getting a whole lot smarter. Forget just likes; we are talking deep dives into who is *really* vibing with your content.

unnormalised: New tools let you see, like, if your biryani recipe reel is getting more love from Chennai than Delhi. Or how many of your followers are genuinely interested in your Onam celebrations compared to just casually scrolling.
normalised: New tools let you see, like, if your biryani recipe reel is getting more love from Chennai than Delhi. Or how many of your followers are genuinely interested in your Onam celebrations compared to just casually scrolling.

unnormalised: Think age, location (down to the city!), and even what other kind of content they engage with. This helps you fine-tune your content so it resonates more with your target audience, like, knowing if your audience prefers Alia Bhatt reels or Deepika Padukone ones.
normalised: Think age, location (down to the city!), and even what other kind of content they engage with. This helps you fine-tune your content so it resonates more with your target audience, like, knowing if your audience prefers Alia Bhatt reels or Deepika Padukone ones.

unnormalised: Leading the charge is Bangalore-based startup, "Filter Coffee Analytics," offering super-detailed reports at a competitive price (packages start at Rs. 5000). They say their AI algorithms can predict engagement rates with up to 85% accuracy.
normalised: Leading the charge is Bangalore-based startup, "Filter Coffee Analytics," offering super-detailed reports at a competitive price (packages start at rupee five thousand). They say their A I algorithms can predict engagement rates with up to eighty five percent accuracy.

unnormalised: Imagine crafting campaigns that *actually* work, instead of just throwing stuff at the wall and hoping something sticks! No more guesswork, just data-driven brilliance. Get analysing!
normalised: Imagine crafting campaigns that *actually* work, instead of just throwing stuff at the wall and hoping something sticks! No more guesswork, just data-driven brilliance. Get analysing!
